gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 116, Pelicans 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeated the Pelicans, 116-115, in overtime. Ja Morant led the way for the Grizzlies with 31 points, five rebounds and seven assists, while Desmond Bane added 27 points, seven assists and five 3PM in the victory. Brandon Ingram (24 points, six rebounds, seven assists) and Zion Williamson (23 points, 11 rebounds) combined for 47 points for the Pelicans in the losing effort. The Grizzlies have won four consecutive games as they improve to 10-19 on the season, while the Pelicans fall to 17-14.
